plural.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a form of a word that shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘dogs’ is the plural of ‘dog’
plural.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘Sheep’ remains the same in the plural.
plural.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a plural word or form shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘we’ is a plural pronoun.
plural.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a plural society, system, or culture is one with people from many different religions, races etc
plural.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Britain has developed into a plural society.
